## BoundaryStateHandlerWithTeardown.teardown() method

Call the user's state teardown function

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[BoundaryResult](./case-boundary.boundaryresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;
